snippet.title: Lesson 18 - The Fallacies of Distributed Computing
snippet.description: In this lesson Mark Richards reviews the 8 fallacies of distributed computing, something that we face as both developers and architects when breaking apart our monolithic applications into distributed architectures like Service-based architecture or Microservices. Knowing and understanding these 8 fallacies will save you time, money, and pain when moving to distributed architectures. Stay tuned each Monday for more lessons in Software Architecture at https://www.developertoarchitect.com/lessons/.
